title: ZNA: Journey
description: 99.9% of Earth's population died seven months ago.They didn't stay dead.Paul Anderson has finally escaped from the city and found temporary refuge with a group of other survivors at a remote campground.Each one of the embattled survivors details their own personal account of the tragedy on the day that the living died, only to rise again, hungry for living flesh.When a horde of zombies invades their encampment, surprises await as the true effects of a viral experiment gone haywire are finally discovered.ZNA: Journey is book TWO of the ZNA series.(20k+ words)
author: Matthew Boyd
